price: 26. Iš tiesų, tame yra pamoka (t. y. perspėjimas) tiems, kurie bijo (Allaho).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
